channel.title: Teleport by clicking on the emotes
channel.description: you know the screen where all the emotes are whats the name of the file so i can change the coord it teles you to if you can help that be great

item.title: Teleport by clicking on the emotes
item.dc:creator: @Honor_Swords Honor Swords
item.description:
@Honor_Swords wrote:

i already have them i cant seem to find ones already made in my client.java i was to edit the cord but there not in there what other file can they be in lol?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2008, 08:03:23 am[/size][hr]and case 185 has cape emote stuff[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2008, 05:35:22 am[/size][hr]in case 185 it says this now where do i put this

Once you get the action button, in case 185 in your client.java, do this:

case EMOTEbuttonID:
teleportToX = ;
teleportToY = ;
break

case 185: // clicking most buttons
actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)) {
println_debug("Case 185: " + actionButtonId);
}
switch (actionButtonId) {
case 28164:
case 28165:
case 28166:
case 28168:
case 28215:
case 28171:
case 28170:
case 28172:
case 28178:
break;

        case 28173:
        case 28174:
        case 28169:
        case 28175:
        case 28167:
        case 28176:
        case 28177:
        case 28179:
        case 28180:
            break;

Read full topic
item.source: Teleport by clicking on the emotes
